text:
• Do not assert sole decision-making for the kid in the absence of legal orders
robert
Message 3561 of 4024
I can't understand what you are saying here. You sent me every memory in our house. They are in boxes downstairs. That is visibility. Why do you say
things like this? Are you just denying reality to poke at me? Is this like Kevin, where I have the evidence in my possession, and you say it is not real?
That is crazy making. Please stop that kind of communication. It is counterproductive.
Oh, and I know you refuse to engage.
Sent:07/11/2024 at 11:48 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 12:44 PM)
Subject:Re: Stripping
Message 3562 of 4024
I know that Connor and Jennifer are engaged.
So were;
• Yurushka: Weekly Family Dinners
• Debbie: New Moyer Traditions
• Dr Brown: Multiple Parenting plans
How is this any different? At all? I have seen the movie. I know the ending. You ALWAYS say "wait till XYZ says what we should do." Then ignore it.
It's so repeatable that its a joke to act otherwise.
So, will you not do anything short-term, knowing you always ignore the long term?
Sent:07/11/2024 at 12:28 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 12:51 PM)
Subject:Re: Truth - please stop these types of comminications
Message 3563 of 4024
Thanks so much. Can you suggest a protocol so I can crack the code? Since you have not allowed me to give gifts to either of my children without
multi-week delays and an act of God? I'd love to sort this out. Blocking gifts from the target is a cut and dry alienation so please work with me.
I know you are erasing me, but I owe it to the kids to try and find a place in their life despite you.
Sent:07/11/2024 at 12:34 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 12:55 PM)
Subject:Re: Gifts From Dad
Message 3564 of 4024
I disagree with many of your statements below and interpretation of events.
